input:

A. Increased by 40.3 to 55.7%
B. Decreased by 40.3 to 55.7%
C. No significant change
D. Decreased by 22.4 to 33.7%

A. OsFIE2
B. OsFIE1
C. Neither OsFIE1 nor OsFIE2
D. Both OsFIE1 and OsFIE2

A. Both OsFIE1 and OsFIE2
B. Neither OsFIE1 nor OsFIE2
C. OsFIE1
D. OsFIE2

A. In the lamina joint, young florets, stem, vascular bundles, leaf sheath and root
B. Only in the vascular bundles
C. Only in the young florets
D. Only in the lamina joint

A. The phenotypes of the rela mutant
B. The photosynthesis process
C. The growth of the rice plant
D. The reproductive process of the rice plant
